title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

For Task A, the response must correctly identify the country with the second highest amount of natural resources rents as a percentage of GDP in 2014.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a pattern in the amount of natural resources rents as a percentage of GDP in Nigeria from 2010 to 2018.

For Task C, the response must correctly describe political legitimacy.

For Task D, the response must correctly draw a conclusion about natural resources rents in Iran.

For Task E, the response must correctly explain what the data in the graph imply about political legitimacy in authoritarian states
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes five of the tasks set by the question.
